column2:
google_rating_words |>
  filter(n >= 10) |> 
  filter(word %out% c("shawn", "sohag", "rafat", "md", "anik", "nero", "makhani", 
                      "mir", "ak", "kl", "belal", "lauk", "marcus", "omar", "halah", 
                      "zahangir")) |> 
  arrange(desc(tf_idf)) |> 
  group_by(rating) |> 
  slice(1:20) |>
  ggplot(aes(x = tf_idf, 
             y = reorder_within(str_sub(word, 1, 25), 
                                tf_idf, 
                                rating))) + 
  geom_col() + 
  scale_y_reordered() + 
  facet_wrap(~ rating, scales = "free")
